rules.description: KBD: BluetoothConverter、IKBC_C87、XD60: Swap Win/CMD and Alt/Opt
Hyper Application (held down hyper+g to Fn)
Hyper Misc    (Check https://github.com/suliveevil/Capslock for all details)
Mac OSX: left cmd + double-tap q → close application
Mac OSX: disable cmd + h to prevent minimising an application window
Mac OSX: disable cmd + option + h + m to prevent minimising all windows
Use (TODO: fn?) right_command+h/l to switch tabs in an application.
Use (TODO: fn?) right_command+j/k to switch windows of the foreground application .
Change cmd+backslach to cmd+f11 if pressed in VSCode or Cursor
